glossary.title: Abbreviations
glossary.p: EOs: Essential Oils; MC: majority compounds; TPC: Total polyphenol content; AC: Antioxidant capacity; GC–MS: Gas chromatography–mass spectrometry; MIC: Minimum inhibitory concentration; HD: hydrodistillation; CA: Cryptocarya alba (Peumo); LS: Laurelia sempervirens (Laurel).
